Package it.polimi.vovarini.model.moves

Class Destruction

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.vovarini.model.moves.Move
it.polimi.vovarini.model.moves.Destruction
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Destruction
extends Move
This class represents an undo of a Construction move.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Destruction

      public Destruction​(Board board, Block block, Point point, boolean forced)
      Builds a Destruction move
      Parameters:
      board - the board where the game is played and the items are placed
      block - the block you want to destroy
      point - the coordinates of the Box containing the block you want to destroy
      forced - true if the system forces the move, false otherwise (user move)

    • Destruction

      public Destruction​(Board board, Block block, Point point)
      Builds a Destruction, non-forced move
      Parameters:
      board - the board where the game is played and the items are placed
      block - the block you want to destroy
      point - the coordinates of the Box containing the block you want to destroy

  • Method Details

    • reverse

      public Move reverse()
      Creates a Construction move undoing the effects of the Destruction move
      Specified by:
      reverse in class Move
      Returns:
      a Construction move with the exact reverse effect of the Destruction move

    • execute

      public void execute()
      This method plainly executes in a physical way the Construction on the board
      Specified by:
      execute in class Move

    • getBlock

      public Block getBlock()
      Getter method for the block of the Destruction move
      Returns:
      the block you want to destroy with the Destruction

    • getTarget

      public Point getTarget()
      Getter method for the coordinates of the Box you want to destroy upon
      Returns:
      a Point representing the coordinates of the Box you want to destroy upon
